summary: A slightly retouched Dark Brotherhood Armour.
descriptionHtml:
25/08/2014 UPADTE: Added a [color=#999999]Grey [color=#f4f4f4]and [color=#000000]Black [color=#f4f4f4]version due to the hate on the Red color. I listen to feedback.[/color][/color][/color][/color] Also, updated. Now the colors are darker to fix the ridiculousness. Original download is still up for those who do like it.

So, we all know how [color=#980000]The Dark Brotherhood [/color]uses a [color=#980000]Red [color=#f4f4f4]and [color=#000000]Black [color=#f4f4f4]armor... though it kinda looks like a [color=#a61c00]Faded Red [color=#f4f4f4]and [color=#000000]Dark Grey [color=#f4f4f4]armour[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color]. I just... I wanted to make it a little livelier. Sure, yeah. The purpose of the Dark Brotherhood is to[color=#00ff00] Strike[/color] [color=#00ff00]Hard and fade into the Night. [color=#f4f4f4]But why not do it styling a Black armor with Red pieces AND some "blood stains" on it? That's what I envisioned, and so, I restyled it and made the colors a bit more like what could be imagined. You know, Real Red and Real Black? I liked the result. I really did. Feel freee to speak your mind.[/color][/color]
author: TwoSyxxtySeven
